{"step_by_step_thinking": "Selinexor is a drug that has been approved by the FDA for the treatment of multiple myeloma in certain cases. It is used in combination with dexamethasone for the treatment of adult patients with relapsed or refractory multiple myeloma who have received at least four prior therapies and whose disease is resistant to several other treatments. Therefore, it can be considered effective for multiple myeloma in these specific cases.", "answer_choice": "A"}
